rewrite1:
Revised instructions:

"Begin with the fifth paragraph: adjust the Outline Level to Level 2 and apply bold formatting to the text. Choose 'Malgun Gothic' for the font, and make sure there is no space following the paragraph.

Moving on to the fourth paragraph: alter the line spacing to 'Multiple' with a factor of 3 lines. Emphasize the text by bolding it, align the text to the right, and reduce the font size to 48 points."
rewrite2:
Please adjust the formatting for the fifth paragraph by setting the Outline Level to Level 2 and bolding the text. Choose 'Malgun Gothic' for the font style and eliminate any space following the paragraph.

For the fourth paragraph, change the line spacing to 'Multiple' at 3 lines. Ensure the text is bolded, align the content to the right, and reduce the font size to 48 points.
rewrite3:
Please adjust the formatting for the fifth paragraph as follows: Modify the Outline Level to Level 2, apply bold styling to the text, switch the font to Malgun Gothic, and eliminate any spacing following the paragraph.

For the fourth paragraph, apply these changes: Adjust the line spacing to Multiple with a factor of 3 lines, bold the entire paragraph, align the text to the right, and reduce the font size to 48 points.
